txt.en: Return to Bráthi with the sapphires that you have collected
Bráthi can be found at Zidir-nesad, The Steepset.\n\nYou should return to Bráthi with the sapphires that you have collected.

'I am in search of a rare treasure of Gundabad. I believe many have been stolen by the evil Men, the Angmarim that reside in the mountains here. Would you be able to collect lost sapphires that were mined and crafted by dwarves in Gundabad long ago?'
Bráthi the Master Prospector is in search of rare treasures in Gundabad.
Sapphires may be found on Men throughout Gundabad.\n\nYou should collect sapphires for Bráthi.
'Thank you! These sapphires are a beauty to behold and such craftsmanship! What wonders are in Gundabad!'
